duties_responsibilities.duty: Drive sales by providing an inspiring environment that motivates customers to make purchases.
Deliver a consistent and exceptional sales floor experience for customers.
Support sales floor, fitting room, point of sale, and operational processes, ensuring effective execution.
Build rapport with customers, acknowledge their needs, and assist them in finding the right products.
Onboard, train, and develop associates, ensuring a high level of performance and customer service.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent (Associate's degree preferred)
